The Volge Students will be able to visit sports institutions and khakis, discotheques and thematic parties free of charge on 25 January, these and other events were part of the Russian Students ' Day celebration programme in 2024. According to the Wizard Truth...

The fire of the entire Russian family chastity was delivered to the Volgograd region

Sergei Borodin♪25.01.2024 at 09:020
A part of the entire Russian family chastity, lit at the " Rodney-Love " forum in Moscow, young people of Vladislav and Alexandra Kaplans arrived in the Volgograd region. The " Volge Truth " was reported to the press service of the Volgograd province. A month ago on Day...

The Dry Law was introduced on 25 January in Volzh and Volgograd

Sergei Borodin♪25.01.2024 in 08:360
On 25 January, a retail sale of alcoholic beverages, including beer, was prohibited throughout the Volgograd region. Drinking alcohol in the region on 25 January can only be found in a hospital, a café or restaurant, and the Regional Information and Analysis...
Find out more.

The first memorable pillar of the Stalingrad Valley appeared in the Volgograd region

Sergei Borodin♪24.01.2024 at 17:060
The memorial area with the memorial wall of " Rubin Stalingrad Doble " was opened in the town of Cotelnikovo Volgograd. According to the " Woman Truth " in the press service of the administration of the region, the height of the verge is 10 metres, weighing over 2.7 tons. She's on it...
Find out more.

Vladimir Putin named Russia as family.

Sergei Borodin♪24.01.2024 at 11:060
Vladimir Putin, within the framework of the All-Russian Forum, the " Red-Love " gave birth to the Year of the Family in Russia. He noted that family values consolidated Russian society, reported Lenta.ru. "I say more: Russia is, in fact, a huge family, you know, family...
Find out more.

Magic students went to the police station tour.

Darya Iveleva♪24.01.2024 at 10:030
As part of the Studience Desant, students of WIEF, as well as the Volga Humanitarian Institute (Philia) of the Volgograd State University, visited structural units and met the police. The heads of units had an interesting conversation with the youth and told the boys...
Find out more.

Work on the Five: the City Development Council was held in the Volga

Ludmila Dmitrieva♪23.01.2024 in 19:010
On 23 January, a meeting on urban development was held in the CEC " October " , chaired by the Head of the Volgograd Region, Andrei Bocharov. It was attended by the municipal authorities, the deputy corps, representatives of public associations, sports, cultural, educational fields, industry...
Find out more.

A total of 17.6 billion roubles have already been sent to the city of Volj

Sergei Borodin♪23.01.2024 at 14:430
17.6 billion roubles of planned 22 billion roubles have already been allocated to infrastructure and social development in the city of Volj. This was reported by Andrei Bocharov, head of the Volgograd region, during a meeting of the Volge Development Council, which was held...
Find out more.
